name: Emojji
description:
Whether its friendship romance or competition, it all waits for you on Emojji island. WATCH:

https://www.twitch.tv/asrielaaestas

BECOME A CONTESTANT:

https://discord.gg/Pzcebtnpd3

please note that this is a twitch game as such it is a live event game the game intends to be an ongoing game to celebrate,  poke fun at and inspect the nature of the social constructs we live in.
